about.title: About
about.content: Beginner developer focused on the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js). Experienced in building small fullstack applications, working with REST APIs, databases, and version control systems (Git). Looking for a job or internship as a Backend, Fullstack, or Frontend Developer, or QA Engineer. Eager to learn new technologies, contribute to a team, and improve both hard and soft skills.

education.title: Education
education.content:
National Technical University of Ukraine 'Igor Sikorsky Kyiv Polytechnic Institut'.
Faculty of Applied Mathematics. Department of Computer Systems Software.
121 Software engineering.
English level - B1 Intermediate.
